function.name: deviceTemperatureSetting_getValue
function.description: This function is used to request the set temperature of a specific compartment in a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to get the temperature from.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment to get the temperature from.
